abstract: With its stock down more than 50 percent since January, Bank of America is set to eliminate at least 3,500 jobs in the coming months to cut quarterly costs by $1.5 billion.
snippet: With its stock down more than 50 percent since January, Bank of America is set to eliminate at least 3,500 jobs in the coming months to cut quarterly costs by $1.5 billion.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America is set to eliminate at least 3,500 jobs in the coming months, as the beleaguered financial giant seeks to cut costs and restructure amid deepening shareholder dissatisfaction.

headline.main: Bank of America Plans Big Layoffs to Cut Costs
headline.print_headline: Bank Plans Big Layoffs To Cut Costs

abstract: In an internal memo obtained by DealBook, the financial firm’s chief executive, Brian T. Moynihan, noted that it would be difficult to “manage through reductions,” but emphasized that the bank “will get through these challenges.”
snippet: In an internal memo obtained by DealBook, the financial firm’s chief executive, Brian T. Moynihan, noted that it would be difficult to “manage through reductions,” but emphasized that the bank “will get through these challenges.”
lead_paragraph: The pain continues at Bank of America.

abstract: Caller ID spoofing, the way hackers gain access to phone voice mail accounts, can also be used to get someone else’s credit card information.
snippet: Caller ID spoofing, the way hackers gain access to phone voice mail accounts, can also be used to get someone else’s credit card information.
lead_paragraph: For all of the palace intrigue recently about who in Rupert Murdoch’s News Corporation kingdom knew what about phone hacking when, one fundamental question about the scandal has gone mostly unanswered:

headline.main: Your Voice Mail May Be Even Less Secure Than You Thought
headline.print_headline: Your Voice Mail May Be Even Less Secure Than You Thought

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
